titles.title: National Guard and Reserves Housing Equity Act of 2005

A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to require that members of the National Guard and Reserve called or ordered to active duty for a period of more than 30 days to receive a basic allowance for housing at the same rate as similarly situated members of the regular components of the uniformed services.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 4/28/2005--Introduced.
